蠸字的基本解释

蠸
quán
即“黄守瓜”，瓜类的害虫，成虫吃瓜叶，幼虫咬细根：“瞀芮生乎腐蠸。”亦称“瓜萤”。

蠸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quán］
［《廣韻》巨員切，平仙，羣。］
一种喜食瓜叶的黄甲小虫。也称守瓜。

蠸字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蠸； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1104第03
【唐韻】巨員切【集韻】逵員切，?音權。【爾雅·釋蟲】蠸，輿父，守瓜。【註】今瓜中黃甲小蟲，喜食瓜葉，故曰守瓜。【莊子·至樂篇】瞀芮生乎腐蠸。又【本草】馬陸，一名馬蠸。　又【說文】一曰大螫也。　又【類篇】呼官切，音歡。義同。又【集韻】呼玩切，音喚。大鼈也。

蠸字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蠸字的起名意思

暂无。

Scorpion
Basic explanation of words
Scorpion
quán
Namely "Yellow Shougua", a pest of melons. Adults eat melon leaves and larvae bite fine roots: "Diao Rui is born with rots." Also known as "melon firefly".
Scorpion
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［quán］
["Guangyun" giant cut, flat fairy, group. ]
A yellow beetle that likes to eat melon leaves. Also called Shougua.
Scorpion
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蠸; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1104 Page 03
[Tang Yun] Giant members cut [Ji Yun] Kui members cut, right? 【Erya·Shu Chong】Zhi, Yufu, Shougua. [Note] The yellow beetle in this melon loves to eat melon leaves, so it is called "shou melon". [Zhuangzi·Zhi Le Chapter] Rui Rui is born with rot. Also 【Materia Medica】Ma Lu, a horse worm.　[Said the text] One said that the big sting is also.　[Classes] Hook the official cut, sound Huan. The same meaning. Also [Jiyun] play and cut, sound call. The big turtle is also.
Scorpion

Name meaning
Nothing.
quán, huán, kuàn
сущ.
1) quán, huán зоол. Aulacophora femorales (вид жука-листоеда, вредитель бахчевых культур)
2) quán, huán тысяченожка
3) kuàn крупная черепаха
